Entities.Name: DrugName
Entities.Definition: Name of the medication, including generic and brand names.

Entities.Name: Strength
Entities.Definition: The concentration or potency of the drug.

Entities.Name: Route
Entities.Definition: Method by which the medication is administered.

Entities.Name: Frequency
Entities.Definition: How often the medication is taken.

Entities.Name: Form
Entities.Definition: The physical form of the medication.

Entities.Name: Dose Amount
Entities.Definition: Amount or quantity of medication taken at once.

Entities.Name: IntakeTime
Entities.Definition: Time of day or context when medication is taken.

Entities.Name: Duration
Entities.Definition: Length of time the medication should be taken.

Entities.Name: Refill
Entities.Definition: Number of authorized refills for the medication.

Entities.Name: Necessity
Entities.Definition: Indication of need or condition under which the medication is taken.

Dataset.Name: Vanderbilt Synthetic Derivative (SD) Clinical Notes
Dataset.Description: Clinical discharge summaries and outpatient visit notes from the Vanderbilt SD database, annotated for 11 medication-related categories.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Entities were annotated using a sequential semantic tagger combining RxNorm lexicons and regular expressions, followed by rule-based disambiguation. Evaluation was conducted against manually reviewed gold standards.
